abstract: To fend off the activist investor Sardar Biglari, Cracker Barrel has adopted a poison pill takeover defense that even corporate governance advocates could like.
snippet: To fend off the activist investor Sardar Biglari, Cracker Barrel has adopted a poison pill takeover defense that even corporate governance advocates could like.
lead_paragraph: Cracker Barrel Old Country Store is the latest public company to come under siege by a one-man activist force. But instead of the usual suspect, Carl C. Icahn, the activist force is Sardar Biglari, chief executive of the publicly traded Biglari Holdings. Most people know Biglari Holdings by its primary subsidiary, Steak ’n Shake.

headline.main: Cracker Barrel Uses Soft Touch to Keep Pursuer at Bay
